title: Blood Moon
description:
Things always seem to go awry when Mercury is in retrograde, and today happens to be the start of that shift in the planets. It’s an excuse for people to be erratic, emotional, and driven to do terrible things. It’s also a time when the supernatural creeps into our lives just to mess with us. As if that wasn’t bad enough, this week we’ll have a total lunar eclipse, also known as a Blood Moon, so this is a warning to all my listeners: beware of the dark. 

First, a death wish
Followed by know thy neighbor or suffer
Then, cards of misfortune 
Finally in our featured story, the monster strikes again

Match with your dedicated therapist today at talkspace.com and use promo code scary during sign-up to get $100 off your first month.

Go to the App Store or Google play to download Best Fiends for free.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
